channel.title: Events on StackRef Whistle
channel.description: Recent content in Events on StackRef Whistle

item.title: Follow and Vote for StackRef on Product Hunt!
item.description:
Mark your calendars, folks!

StackRef will be officially launching on Product Hunt on Wednesday, December 13, 2023!

item.title: In case you missed it: 'Security Testing During Ideation: A Hackathon Perspective'
item.description: In case you missed the presentation at this year’s Snyk DevSecCon24, here’s the recording that you can watch at your leisure!

item.title: Presenting 'Security Testing During Ideation: A Hackathon Perspective' at DevSecCon24!
item.description: I’ll be presenting at this year’s Snyk DevSecCon24 on June 27, 2023, in a lighting talk titled “Security Testing During Ideation: A Hackathon Perspective!”
